meanings.sent1: The teacher was misteaching the students on how to solve the math problem.
meanings.sent2: She realized she was misteaching the children the wrong way to tie their shoes.
meanings.sent3: The robot misteaching the dance moves was quite a sight to see.
meanings.sent4: His misguided instructions were misteaching the new employees on company policies.
meanings.sent5: The chef's incorrect recipe was misteaching the apprentice chefs how to make the dish.

meanings.definition: The action or practice of teaching incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: Misteaching can lead to confusion among students in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The school implemented new measures to prevent misteaching in their curriculum.
meanings.sent3: The comedy skit about misteaching had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent4: In the world of music, misteaching can result in discordant performances.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of misteaching became evident in the students' poor test scores.
